citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on
12/08/2015. No one was available after knocking on doors on all buildings on premises (two houses and the
workshop) and waiting 30 minutes for anyone to arrive home.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 on
12/08/2015. No one was available after knocking on doors on all buildings on premises (two houses and the
workshop) and waiting 30 minutes for anyone to arrive home.
